name: Avalanche A.D. - Manus Dei CS
description: Featuring current and former members of Empire Of Rats and Carved Out, this is the heaviest, darkest, meanest band to come out of Columbus in a long, long time. Manus Dei, their debut release as Avalanche A.D., shows a band taking all of the power and energy of their previous incarnation, and pushing it to the very limits of hardcore. Includes digital download code. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: KDC - The Veracity Of Solitude LP
description: Here it is. The debut LP from one of the hardest working bands in hardcore today. If you haven't seen this band yet, you haven't been paying attention. Coming off an incredible 7" and near-constant touring since, KDC has taken this experience and crafted one of the most genuinely interesting, but perfectly intense, emotional hardcore records in years. With its seamless blending of modern speed and power, '90s technical brilliance, and a rare honesty, this record truly stands out. Includes digital download code. Pressing information: Blue - 100 (webstore exclusive) Red - 200 Coke bottle clear - 200 Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Its For A Cop - s/t CS
description: Don't let the name, art, song titles, and lyrics fool you: this is not a joke band. Denver, Colorado's Its For A Cop have delivered 11 songs of blistering, intense, no-bullshit powerviolence that DEMAND to be taken seriously. The first 25 orders come with a free 12" vest bottom patch! Includes digital download code. Pressing information: Red - 25 (webstore exclusive) Black - 75 Purchase it digitally, or check it out now at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Eternal Sleep - Dead Like Me 7"
description: On Dead Like Me, this Pittsburgh powerhouse fulfills every promise they made on Lessons, and then some. Every bit as devastating as their debut, but with a new found depth, and somehow - contrary to all reason - even heavier. Their love for the heavy grunge of the '90s that was hinted at before, is displayed proudly here. And to incredible effect. Includes a digital download for both Dead Like Me and Lessons. Pressing information: 100 on Purple (webstore exclusive) 200 on Grey 200 on White Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Eternal Sleep - Dead Like Me T-shirt
description: Limited Dead Like Me t-shirt!

name: Headacher - Flexi
description: Two brand new songs of the noisy, disgusting post-hardcore that this band has perfected. Complex and unsettling rhythms, almost unfathomably dissonant guitars, and genuinely captivating basslines make this band truly standout. Like some sort of twisted amalgam of Drive Like Jehu, Jawbox, and Hoover, this is not one of those bands your mom will tolerate in between her Neil Diamond CDs on the long drive to your Grandma's house. Limited to 250 copies, with a 3D cover/insert and label, and a pair of 3D glasses. Includes a digital download code with a bonus track. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Headacher - Flexi / Shirt Bundle
description: We have just a few shirts left from the release show for this record, and you can get one in this limited bundle! Two brand new songs of the noisy, disgusting post-hardcore that this band has perfected. Complex and unsettling rhythms, almost unfathomably dissonant guitars, and genuinely captivating basslines make this band truly standout. Like some sort of twisted amalgam of Drive Like Jehu, Jawbox, and Hoover, this is not one of those bands your mom will tolerate in between her Neil Diamond CDs on the long drive to your Grandma's house. Limited to 250 copies, with a 3D cover/insert and label, and a pair of 3D glasses. Includes a digital download code with a bonus track. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Permanent Night - Welcome To The World Below CS
description: Louisville, Kentucky's Permanent Night burst onto the scene with this ferocious six song cassette EP. It's fast, heavy, chaotic, and totally unrelenting. Although the frequent comparisons to bands like American Nightmare and Converge are appropriate, they ignore the Jesus Lizard/Deadguy-esque riffiness that really makes this band, featuring members of Late Ones and Rattletooth, stand out among their peers. All webstore orders come with a free button and canvas patch. Includes digital download code. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Moutheater - Ornament LP
description: After years of frustration and waiting, Head2Wall Records is proud to take the reigns and finally give this incredible album the vinyl treatment it deserves. This first full-length from the Holy Terror hardcore/post-hardcore outfit is a must-have for all fans of intelligent heavy music. Here it is. No pre-order, no upcoming release date. Order it today, it ships tomorrow. Includes digital download code. Pressing information: Pink/Green split - 6 (not available for sale) Green/Green split - 24 (webstore exclusive) **SOLD OUT** Pink/Black split - 220 Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Eternal Sleep - Lessons CS
description: This is heavy, heavy, hardcore with an unexpected, but very welcome, '90s grunge undercurrent. Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania's Eternal Sleep is anything but easy to define. Four unrelenting tracks of literate, introspective lyrics belted over pummeling riffs, with a sensible amount of shredding, and a driving rhythm section that is likely to cause you physical pain if you are unprepared. Featuring members of Deathright and Unreal City, this band goes above and beyond any expectations you may have of them. For fans of Coalesce, Alice In Chains, Santa Sangre, and TAD. Includes digital download code. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Eternal Sleep - Lessons (European Version) CS
description:
This is the European version of Eternal Sleep's debut cassette EP, Lessons, on Southwest Hardcore Records.  

We have very, very few of these, so don't miss out on the opportunity to snag one without having to pay for international shipping!

name: Triceratops - Phun Is Our Business, And Business Is Good! CS
description: This much talked about, but never released full-length from everyone's favorite defunct mid-west party hardcore band is now available on cassette! These are the final Triceratops recordings, and their only full-length. It's twelve songs of fast, fun, no-nonsense hardcore, like only they could do it. It may be cliche to get nostalgic about something so recent, but for those of us that experienced them in their prime, it's hard not to. Webstore orders come with a free digital download of the entire album, emailed at the time of purchase! Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Nemesis 7"
description: Picking up the pieces of '90s hardcore and the underground heaviness of the '00s, Nemesis pulls influence equally from Helmet and Unbroken, but with a healthy dose of early Rollins Band. With members who have been putting their time into the hardcore scene for years (Triceratops, Empire, Headacher, etc...), the combination of experience and urgency makes for a ripping 11 minutes of unique heaviness. Riffs, riffs, and more riffs. Includes free digital download. Pressing information: 70 on Lavender (webstore exclusive) 100 on Clear 130 on Black Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Lifeguard - Demo Tape
description: The new tape from recently re-formed Columbus pop-punk band, Lifeguard. These 5 songs are packed with all of the energy and emotion you'd expect from a band featuring members of Triceratops and Forget It, but with a melodic punch reminiscent of Lifetime and The Movielife. Available now, just in time for summer. And everyone knows pop punk is always the best in the summer. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Vice - Get Down, Stay Down 7"
description: As harder hardcore goes, no one does it better than New York City. Except for maybe Cleveland. So a band featuring members of Northeastern Ohio heavyweights like Homewrecker, Light Years, and Wreak Havoc, playing hardcore inspired by New York bands like Crown Of Thornz, Cro-mags and Leeway, can't be anything but perfect. Pressing information: 90 on Yellow (webstore exclusive) 200 on Black 204 on Red Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Triceratops 7"
description: If you were going to hardcore shows in the midwest in the mid '00s, chances are you saw Triceratops. This band was the epitome of fast, fun, hardcore. This 7" was recorded in 2008 with the original line-up, and is just now seeing the light of day. They are limited to 100 copies on one-sided, hand-screened, hand-numbered, glow in the dark vinyl, in varying shades of green. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Forget It - Demo Tape
description: Do you remember when hardcore was about playing fast and having fun, and not a fashion-fueled popularity contest? Well, these guys do. This is hardcore. Period. No hyphens, no qualifiers. Featuring members of Triceratops. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Hawkline / Headacher - Split 7"
description: You know how sometimes you go to a hardcore show and, for some reason, there's a band on the bill that musically has no business being there, but just seems to work? These are those bands. Hawkline brings the best that indie-rock has to offer. With hints of everything from Matthew Sweet to On The Might Of Princes, this band will not bore you. Headacher, on the other hand ("...by no means easy listening." -Punknews.org) supplies enough noisy post-hardcore (in the vein of Drive Like Jehu, Jawbox, Hoover, Quicksand, etc...) to make you swear it was 1994. The deluxe packaged copies on clear vinyl are sold out, but it is now available on black or white vinyl, in a hand-screened, hand-numbered, recycled chipboard sleeve, and is limited to 100 copies. This is the remainder of the first press, previously unavailable in these colors. Check it out at head2wallrecords.bandcamp.com/

name: Nemesis - Mola Ram T-shirt
description: "Kali Ma... Kali Ma... Kali Ma Shakti de"

name: Triceratops Swim Team T-shirt
description:
We just got our hands on the last of these shirts, leftover from the final Triceratops show last year.

Super cool.

Super cheap.

name: Anchor - The Singles Collected LP
description:
From the ashes of Damage Control (Livewire Rec) and Set My Path comes ANCHOR! Hailing from Sweden, ANCHOR plays a heavy and aggressive blend of 90ï¿½s style metal / hardcore that brings to mind bands like TRIAL and REFUSED. ANCHOR can be seen on tour almost anywhere in the world, one of the hardest working bands in hardcore today. This record compiles 11 songs of passionate, straight edge, heart filled hardcore. Also includes a free digital download coupon. FFO Refused / Judge / Trial / Snapcase.

From State Of Mind Recordings.

name: At Both Ends zine, #9/#10 + 2x7" (w/ Bane, Grade and more)
description: Included is one 148-page magazine/book that compiles two new issues worth of At Both Ends Magazine and two 7” records with songs from Bane, Grade, Unrestrained (Portland, Oregon) and Between Earth And Sky (members of Trial, By A Thread, Catharsis, Walls Of Jericho). All recordings are exclusive to this release. In the magazine are articles and interviews with Bane, Sick of it All, Verse, Shook Ones, Bill Stevenson, Sparkmarker, Anchor, Shai Hulud, Greg Bennick, Devotion, Wait In Vain, To Kill and a ton more stuff. This is about as packed as a zine can get. The magazine is perfect bound with glossy pages and color covers. Printing is similar to a book and is higher quality than pretty much any commercial magazine you would find in a store.

name: Better Times - If Not Us 7"
description:
Buffalo, NY band Better Times started late 2010, when members of Our Times, No Love Lost, and Impact teamed up to form a new straight edge band. Better Times, musically influenced by bands like INSTED, FLOORPUNCH, GORILLA BISCUITS, and YOUTH OF TODAY, plays energetic, mid-tempo to fast youthcrew hardcore. Lyrically, the band celebrates their local scene and stresses the importance of being positive, having a critical mind, and doing something worthwhile with your life. This record has 7 full, fast, hard hitting, youth crew jams xxx.


This is on almost black or "off black" vinyl and has a nice arigato style jacket with spine. Limited to 210 copies and includes free digital download of the whole album.

From State Of Mind Recordings.

name: The Black Antler CD EP
description:
The debut EP from this incredibly heavy and technical metal/hardcore band from Columbus, Ohio.  This will not disappoint you...

Featuring members of The Phantods, Six Gallery, Compressions, Inept, Rats into Robots, To Dream Of Autumn, The Last Plan, Feci Dal Signore, Teeth On Teeth, Ride To Ruin

Stream it now at http://theblackantler.bandcamp.com/.  

Released January 2013
All songs and words by: The Black Antler
Recording: Alex Douglas @ Old Son Studios
Mastering: John Fintel (Relay Recording)
Album Artwork: Greg Lahm

name: Blood Red - Bad To Worse 7" w/ CD
description:
When you take a look at the history books of Long Island hardcore, two names will instantly jump to your face with large letters: INSIDE and SILENT MAJORITY. After the end of both bands 3 members of Inside decided to team up with Silent Majority vocalist Tommy Corrigan in addition of his brother Vincent. BLOOD RED play hardcore mid 90s Long Island style with a post hardcore and U2 feel to it. This limited release is on all color vinyl with CD, poster, and features silk screened bags. Tommy now sings for Capital (Revelation Records).

1. Archdiocese
2. Heartworm
3. G.S.B.H.C
4. The New Reality

On red vinyl.

From State of Mind Recordings.

name: Dead Wrong / The Banner - Split 7"
description:
The Banner (NJ) and Dead Wrong (CT) team up and lay four tracks down for this vinyl version of the out of print split CD. Members of Dead Wrong now play in Unforgiven.

From State of Mind Recordings.

name: Dolarhyde - s/t LP
description:
If you don't know Dolarhyde calls Birmingham, AL home and play pop-punk that could have landed them on the early Fat Wreck or Epitaph roster, kind of like No Use For A Name or Lagwagon. LP includes Digital Download Coupon and comes in very special all clear packing with clear insert.

Members played in the Recluse and did some time in Make do and Mend

For Fans Of: JAWBREAKER, LAGWAGON, SAVES THE DAY.

From State Of Mind Recordings.

name: Feral King 7"
description:
"Straight out of Virginia Beach, Virginia, this band features members of Spitfire, Fjord, The Takeover, and The End of the Universe, playing heavy music that will appeal to fans of Norma Jean, Deadguy, and Botch.

"Comes with a digital download card."

From Last Anthem Records.

name: Feral King / Lonely Ghost Parade - split 7"
description:
"Once again we are teaming up with RDG Records to release a new split EP from Virginia's FERAL KING (members of Spitfire, The Takeover, etc.) and Pennsylvania's LONELY GHOST PARADE (members of ZAO).

"Will come with a MP3's download card and 3D Glasses!!!"

From Last Anthem Records.

name: Harkonen - Hung To Dry 7"
description:
Harkonen features members of HIMSA / BOTCH / THESE ARMS ARE SNAKES / NARROWS.

Harkonen's 2nd 7". This record documents the period of time when Aaron Edge sang for the band. If you happened to see "The Edge of Quarrel" you might recognize Aaron as the guy who played the SXE character named Rolo.
In fact, everyone in the band at the time of this record played important parts in that movie.

In this incarnation, Harkonen was more of a heavy HC band, most often getting comparisons to Kiss It Goodbye with a little Snapcase here and there for good measure.
Harkonen continued on to release a number of records after this early 7", including a full length on Wreck-Age and a 7" and LP on Hydra Head.  This is on limited green vinyl.

From Excursion Records.

name: Hawkline - Amity CD
description:
It's a rare joy to find an album that you can't help but sing along to, that is also genuinely interesting and challenging.  But this is one of them.

The newest full-length from these longtime Columbus indie guitar rockers picks up right where their last album, Groundswell, left off.  (read: their unexpected but mindblowing Sunny Day Real Estate to Tom Petty ratio is slowly tipping toward the latter).

Featuring members of Headacher and the Josh Krajcik Band.

CD comes in a hand-screened, recycled cardstock sleeve.

Check them out at http://hawkline.bandcamp.com/.

name: Hollow Leg - Abysmal LP
description:
Incredible, brutally heavy new LP from Jacksonville, FLorida's HOLLOW LEG (featuring members of BLOODLET, HOPE & SUICIDE, and JUNIOR BRUCE).

From Last Anthem Records.

name: Junior Bruce - The Headless King LP
description:
Neon Green w/Gatefold Cover (First Pressing)

Fronted by vocalist Scott Angelacos of Bloodlet fame,
JUNIOR BRUCE‘s debut album continues along the sludgy
path paved by their predecessors.

With no intention of rehashing their musical past, JUNIOR BRUCE
take a sharp turn into territory riddled with straightforward
grooves, huge stoner riffs and gruff, yet melodic vocals.
Recommended for fans of St Vitus, Torche and High On Fire.

Comes with a digital download card.

From A389 Recordings.

name: Killed In Action - We Ruin Fun LP
description: Killed In Action have destroyed the hardcore scene, littering the Midwest landscape with a trail of mutilated thrash fans, burned-out house parties and torn up punk clubs.  Killed In Action use a powerviolence foundation and smother it in old school crossover hardcore, new school fast as hell thrash and a very large blast of sarcastic, ugly hatred that fuels their never ever ending quest to ruin everyone's good time! That equals thrash greatness, punks! Fans of MUNICIPAL WASTE, CRUCIAL UNIT, VOETSEK and CAPITALIST CASUALTIES will be in awe of this incredible new recording. Total scene hatred over-load!

name: Moutheater - Lot Lizard 7"
description: Norfolk, VA's Moutheater bring a heavy, noisy style of rock that takes no prisoners and doesn't make any attempts to be pretty or melodic. They play a soundtrack to misery somewhat resembling The Jesus Lizard or The Melvins.

name: Pleasant Living 7"
description:
Baltimore's PLEASANT LIVING's deliver four tracks of insanely catchy NYHC inspired punk/oi/hc featuring dudes that have done time in such bands as Slumlords, Trapped Under Ice, Stout and Fighting Chance.

On grey vinyl.

Comes with a digital download card.

From A389 Recordings.

name: Reviver - Potential Wasteland 7"
description:
Salt Lake City, UT's own Reviver follow up their now out-of-print debut full-length with a 5 track seven inch that includes a 7 song digital download coupon.

Melodic hardcore with a dark, experimental side in the same vein as Modern Life Is War, American Nightmare, and Refused. The track "Undefined" features guest vocals by Derek of Defeater.

From State of Mind Recordings.

name: This Is Hell - s/t 12" EP
description:
This is a one time pressing (650 black, 100 grey) on a 1 sided etched vinyl 12". This record looks amazing and won't be around long so don't miss out.

From State Of Mind Recordings.

name: Trapped Under Ice / Dirty Money - Split 7"
description:
Baltimore's TRAPPED UNDER ICE's need no introduction. Their hybrid of tough NYHC meets Baltimore hardcore has been making waves worldwide for many years now. Defunct UKHC band Dirty Money is on the flipside playing awesome No Warning-esque hardcore. 

On grey vinyl.

Comes with a digital download card.

From A389 Recordings.

name: Where Eagles Dare - To Come From Nowhere LP
description:
Taking elements of modern-day favorites like STRETCH ARMSTRONG, MOST PRECIOUS BLOOD and SHAI HULUD as well as old-school "youth crew" legends such as SICK OF IT ALL and GORILLA BISCUITS, WHERE EAGLES DARE bring their own unique brand of relentless hardcore that attacks from all angles. 

From New Day Rising Records.

name: V/A - Epilogue Vol. 1: Kill Your Idols tribute 7"
description:
This is volume 1 in 4 part limited seven inch series dedicated to KILL YOUR IDOLS. This edition contains 6 bands that consist of friends and fans paying tribute. KYI played all around the world with all kinds of different styles in our underground community. This was put together the same way, diverse including many different styles of punk and hardcore. Each band has chosen to cover the song that means the most to them. The liner notes include some kind words about KYI from every band on the comp. Tracks from BACKTRACK, RUST BELT LIGHTS (x Dead Hearts / Daggermouth), VIOLENT SOCIETY, SEASICK, BULLET TREATMENT, and OFFSIDES (x No Harm Done / Make or Break). After all 4 volumes are released owners of all 4 can put them together and form the KYI logo. Limited to this one pressing ever, never to be repressed!

Track Listing
1- BULLET TREATMENT "Can't Take it Away From me"
2- OFFSIDES "Cast me Aside"
3- BACKTRACK "Enjoy the Show"
4- RUST BELT LIGHTS "Autumn"
5- SEASICK "Hardcore Circa 99"
6- VIOLENT SOCIETY "The Path"

From State of Mind Recordings.
